inclusion.criterion: ED patients with acute pain NRS ≥7 warranting IV opioid analgesia (according to ED provider)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients deemed critically ill by provider
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old woman with recent history of aspiration pneumonia and Clostridium difficile toxin positive stool samples. She is febrile, tachycardic, and hypotensive.
